# isExposureRectOfInterestSupported

**Instance Property**

Whether the device supports exposure rectangles of interest.

## Declaration

```swift
var isExposureRectOfInterestSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You may only set the device’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/exposureRectOfInterest] property if this property returns `true`.

## Setting an exposure rectangle of interest

- **exposureRectOfInterest**: The device’s current exposure rectangle of interest, if it has one.
- **minExposureRectOfInterestSize**: The minimum size you may use when specifying a rectangle of interest.
- **defaultRectForExposurePoint(ofInterest:)**: The default rectangle of interest used for a given exposure point of interest.
